setEffects.4: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

flower.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
flower.desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

plume.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
plume.desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

sands.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
sands.desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

goblet.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
goblet.desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

circlet.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
circlet.desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.
